nodes.text: Ingo Römling is a German comic artist. Since 2015, he's been working on a number of original comic stories written by Martin Fisher for the Star Wars Rebels Magazine. Römling also designs characters for Star Wars Rebels, the animated TV series that spawned the eponymous magazine.
He is the artist of the upcoming comic book adaptation of Greg Rucka's 2015 junior novel Smuggler's Run: A Han Solo & Chewbacca Adventure.
